Package com.tangosol.io.pof.annotation

Annotation Type Portable

  • @Target(TYPE)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Deprecated
public @interface Portable
    Deprecated.
    Since Coherence 14.1.2. Use PortableType annotation instead.
    Portable marks a class as being eligible for use by a PofAnnotationSerializer. This annotation is only permitted at the class level and is a marker annotation with no members. The following class illustrates how to use Portable and PortableProperty annotations. 
     @Portable
 public class Person
     {
     @PortableProperty(0)
     public String getFirstName()
         {
         return m_firstName;
         }

     private String m_firstName;
     @PortableProperty(1)
     private String m_lastName;
     @PortableProperty(2)
     private int m_age;
     }
    Since:
    3.7.1
    Author:
    hr
    See Also:
    PortableProperty
